title: How can we change summoner's name to the previous one?
body:
So, i just changed my summoner's name just now. However, somewhat i dont really like it and i want to use my previous summoner's name. My question is, do i have to purchase back my previous summoner's name, and how am i gonna get it back? T____T 
thanks in advance {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: You will have to purchase the name change again I'm afraid. You could try submitting a support ticket, see if they will change it back for you, but I wouldn't get your hopes up. If you have the IP to do it that's the easiest way.
